name: OhmSurfer
description:
A short 2D platformer created for the "1-Button Jam 2022".
Survive for 60 seconds and defeat the boss to win!

Controls:
Tap Spacebar: Shoot
Hold Spacebar: Jump, Use Jetpack
Stand on charged ground to recover power

Credits:
2D Assets
Warped City - ansimuz
https://ansimuz.itch.io/warped-city

Music
Hyperloop - AlexiAction
https://pixabay.com/music/video-games-gaming-8bit-music-hyperloop-124334/
